sentences.sentence: Olaf Martens pursues his own ideas.
sentences.translation: 马斯滕对自己的观念一意孤行。

sentences.sentence: Martens boots, black jeans, a black shirt, a Mickey Mouse tie, and an earring.

sentences.sentence: I travelled to professor Martens on Wednesday, he made a very good impression to me.
sentences.translation: 我星期三拜访了马滕斯教授，他的建议打动了我。
